whoAmI.title: Who Am I?
whoAmI.content: I am a full-stack web developer passionate about creating innovative digital solutions. With experience in developing modern and scalable web applications, I specialize in both front-end and back-end technologies. My focus is on creating exceptional user experiences and clean, maintainable code.

expertise.title: My Expertise
expertise.content:
Specialized in Magento 2 development, custom module creation, and performance optimization.

I provide expert guidance in e-commerce strategy, combining technical excellence with business understanding.

My approach focuses on delivering scalable solutions that drive measurable business growth and exceptional user experiences.

chausson.title: Chausson Matériaux
chausson.projet:
Creation of an omnichannel strategy and launch of the e-commerce platform for a construction materials leader, managing over 20,000 products.

Implementation of a complete PIM system using Maps, streamlining the creation of automated catalogs and data flows for the website.
chausson.impact:
Reduction in catalog production time by 50-75% through automated workflows.

Delivery of a high-performance e-commerce site with optimized navigation and product management.
chausson.realisations:
Led a team of 20 people between internal and external stakeholders.

Seamless integration of PIM and ERP with the e-commerce platform.

eram.title: ERAM Group
eram.projet:
Technical leadership of Magento sites for Eram, Mellow Yellow, and Bocage brands.

Implementation of preventive, corrective, and evolutionary maintenance, including Magento core updates, custom module adaptation, and dependency monitoring.

Conducted security pre-audit in case of suspected compromise, log analysis, and recommendations to improve platform security.
eram.impact:
Enhanced platform stability and security through proactive updates.

Improved customer experience with targeted performance optimizations.
eram.realisations:
Implementation of Web Application Firewalls (WAF) for advanced security in collaboration with IT teams.

Smooth management of CI/CD pipelines for multi-environment deployments.

whisky.title: La Maison du Whisky
whisky.projet:
Technical leadership of the Magento 2 platform, ensuring robust functionality and high performance for this luxury spirits retailer.

Focus on preventive maintenance, core update implementation, and adaptation of custom modules to latest Magento standards.
whisky.impact:
Strengthened site reliability and resilience to ensure excellent user experience, even during peak periods.

Delivered optimized infrastructure for scalability and future growth.
whisky.realisations:
Deployment and configuration of advanced application firewalls (Fastly WAF) in collaboration with IT teams.

Monitoring and updating dependencies while maintaining compatibility with custom code.

legrand.title: Legrand
legrand.projet:
Design and development of the alpha version of a Magento 2 B2B platform for a global leader in electrical and digital building infrastructures.

Creation of custom product displays and enhancement of cart functionalities adapted to professional buyers.
legrand.impact:
Built a scalable foundation for Legrand's B2B digital transformation.

Improved product catalog management and user experience for professional clients.
legrand.realisations:
Customization of Magento to handle complex product and category hierarchies.

Seamless integration between front-end and back-end systems.

marjane.title: Marjane Mall
marjane.projet:
Management of Magento 2 integration and deployment of the Octopia marketplace for Morocco's leading retailer, Marjane.

Organization and execution of the mobile application reversibility process, including deadline management, coordination of multiple teams, and delivery of final versions on Google Play and Apple Store.

Delivery of a React Native hybrid mobile application supporting over 70,000 products with a roadmap to evolve to 1 million.
marjane.impact:
Launch of a scalable e-commerce and mobile platform designed for high-growth vendor and product management.

Improved operational workflows through efficient team coordination and technical solutions.
marjane.realisations:
Planning and execution of a Magento upgrade from 2.4.2 to 2.4.5, optimizing site performance and security.

Establishment of a new version deployment workflow, improving update frequency and stability.

valrhona.title: Valrhona
valrhona.projet:
Redesign of the Valrhona Selection B2B platform to enhance customer experience and integrate advanced marketplace features with Mirakl.

Configuration of Salesforce API flows with custom authentication, enabling smoother customer interactions.

Implementation of Single Sign-On (SSO) via custom SAML module to simplify enterprise client access.
valrhona.impact:
Streamlined onboarding process for professional clients and improved platform efficiency.

Enhanced security and usability for large-scale B2B transactions.
valrhona.realisations:
Led a team of 7 developers, ensuring high code quality and timely delivery.

Conducted thorough audits and testing to prepare the platform for high-traffic usage.
